mapper.select: SELECT pr.*, p.*, pd.*, b.* FROM program_reservation pr INNER JOIN payment p ON pr.payment_no = p.payment_no INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN branch b ON pr.branch_no = b.branch_no ORDER BY program_reservation_no;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO program_reservation program_reservation_no, payment_no, program_date_no, branch_no;
